sections.title: Accessing e911 Service
sections.content: e911 is a **mobile-First service** - i.e. designed to be fully accessible using the **mobile phone **among other personal electronic devices. It uses **USSD commands **and **Simple Menu **to enable structured, intelligent communications within the network, through various ONLINE-OFFLINE Information and Communication channels.

sections.title: Offline Channels
sections.content:
1.  Short Messaging Service (SMS)  

2.  USSD and SIM ToolKit _(opening soon)_

sections.title: Online Channels
sections.content:
1.  **Instant Messenger** (Telegram, facebook, skype, Kik)  

2.  Web and App _(opening soon)_
